post.body: : No sleepwalking needed. One of the best things about cosleeping: the kid is right there. BF means the food is too :)
: Cosleeping helps. We learned to feed + change kids without ever fully waking up.
: I blame days with no sleep for getting my MS. I'm convinced the committee was scared not to give it to me.
: Because Debian/Ubuntu is the absolute QUEEN of "not invented here".
: Welcome home :)
It's past time to get back to an empty inbox.
#dailygoals: 1) CI server work 2) Content for AFC 3) Fix reconciliation issues on project I.
Must be morning again. Enjoying a few moments of child-free time.
What part of "I don't know the answer to your problem" is unclear?
Amazing, that code actually worked. 3/3 on #dailygoals.
Sadly, the folks who got phished are probably the most likely to be using the same password everywhere.
Watching config.gems throw up all over my screen. Again.
OK, time to look at Amazon Simple Pay code.
I find myself very amused at the "update genius" menu item in iTunes. Perhaps this indicates too much merlot at dinner.
One of the best things about the internet is that it makes it trivially easy to get the music of my high school years to torment family with
Dinner turned out OK in spite of going from sound asleep to on the table in 60 minutes. 3/4 kids ate, a reasonable number.
Time to try to come up with dinner
Back awake after a long nap. Feeling mildly better.
Sometimes I wonder if I'll ever have a business plan that doesn't overdepend on work ethic and stubbornness.
I have reimported this data so many times that I think all the corners are worn off of it by now.
